nodes.text: Thulough was a Rebel lieutenant intelligence officer who lived during the Galactic Civil War. He once went on a mission to Aurilia on the planet Dathomir.

Thulough appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
